title: dog-breed-finder
about: A webpage where the user can look for dogs by breed available for adoption within a specified location

title: code-quiz
about: A timed code quiz consisted of 5 questions where when the user chooses an incorrect answer, there will be a 10 second penalty imposed to the remaining time

title: daily-planner
about: A planner that the user can input text to save for a particular hour in the day. The hours are also color coded where if it is a past hour, the input field will turn red, a future hour will be green, and present color is white.
